column5: na putrāya pradātavyam na śiṣyāya kadā cana ||

column3: jagatsṛṣṭis tathā brahmā viṣṇuḥ pālayito bhavet ||
column5: brahmā viṣṇu-tathā rudraḥ evambhūtam idañ jagat |

column3: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ iti tattvam bhautikaṁ bhuvanatrayam ||
column5: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ mahā janaḥ tapas satyas tadūrdhvakam |

column3: janaṁ pañca tapaṁ ṣaṣṭhyām satyalokañ ca saptadhā |

column3: na kiñcid api niṣkalam viṣṇulokan nigadyate ||
